alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Coastal Bay; Inland Bay; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 15 at 12:33PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Bay, western Calhoun and southeastern Washington Counties in the Panhandle of Florida through 115 PM EDT/1215 PM CDT/... At 1233 PM EDT/1133 AM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles north of Lynn Haven, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Panama City, Lynn Haven, Nixon, Bayhead, Southport, Fountain, Singer Road, Recota Beach, College Station, Saunders, Bayou George, Camp Flowers, Gainer Spring, Bennett, Youngstown, Cairo, Frink, Kinard, Brannonville and Broad Branch. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Calhoun; Coastal Bay; Inland Bay; Washington
